thread.section_title: Ruskin Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Business trip and brung my partner
thread.title_full: Business trip and brung my partner - Review of Ruskin Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kayleigh W
title: Business trip and brung my partner
text:
Hotel .... the room was tidy clean and modern plenty power points and good size tv ... wifi was slow and basically none existent ... breakfast was buffet style and was nice was something for everyone's tastes ...
Bar.... got food on the night food was lovely (Greasy tho) drink with your meal was nice surprise ... service at the bar was good friendly n polite the waitress serving was friendly and polite but could do with better management as mains came out when was still having starters and when starters came was waiting 10 mins for knifes and forks as none was ready washed so waitress had to go wash some while we was sitting with our starters xxx
